rename.from: watch is not getting values property on Edge
rename.to: Watch is not getting values property on Edge (Component is not rendered again)

body:
damn edge 79 before it's not supported and after 79 it supports...

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/input_event#Browser_compatibility

can you please test this on your EDGE?

https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-watch-not-working-edge-9ufs6?file=/src/App.js

@bluebill1049  I wasn't able to see https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-watch-not-working-edge-9ufs6?file=/src/App.js working on my Edge, here the error in my edge console

![edge-not-loading-sandbox](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15802694/81309024-1ace6380-9048-11ea-927f-5319f3c8a5c6.png)

However I downloaded the zip from your codesandbox url and I ran the project locally and the select is having the same strange behavior with onchange event, the watch is not detecting the onchage event and of course the component is not re-rendered.
Here my test on chrome and Edge 

**Debug on Chrome:**
![Debug-local-chrome](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15802694/81310286-85cc6a00-9049-11ea-8f06-0ef86d193010.gif)

**Debug on Edge:**
![Debug-local-edge2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15802694/81323489-16f80c80-905b-11ea-8d39-9c57a77c2e53.gif)

@bluebill1049 I've tested your code locally and I found the reason why your last fix doesn't work yet, It is regarding the element.type values, Here my comments about your validation https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/commit/8218583c74ceac31e8874e60a69dfc819502a2df

You're very close to solve it. :)

oh lord, where is the web standard...
